name: vk_card_tnx_batch
description: This table stores batch information of card transactions, including details about the transaction, account, and processing metadata.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date the batch process was run.

columns.name: crd_acc_id_iss
columns.description: The identifier for the card account issued by the bank.

columns.name: crd_target_id
columns.description: The target identifier for the card transaction.

columns.name: crd_nunber_no
columns.description: The number associated with the card used in the transaction.

columns.name: trans_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: trans_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: post_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction was posted to the account.

columns.name: ccy
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction was conducted.

columns.name: trans_amt
columns.description: The amount of money involved in the transaction.

columns.name: trans_lcy_amt
columns.description: The transaction amount converted to the local currency.

columns.name: fee_amt
columns.description: The fee charged for the transaction.

columns.name: is_fee
columns.description: Indicates whether a fee was applied to the transaction.

columns.name: is_vat
columns.description: Indicates whether VAT was applied to the transaction.

columns.name: province
columns.description: The province where the transaction took place.

columns.name: nationality
columns.description: The nationality of the cardholder.

columns.name: cad_trans_type
columns.description: The type of card transaction.

columns.name: cad_trans_status
columns.description: The status of the card transaction.

columns.name: cad_auth_code
columns.description: The authorization code for the transaction.

columns.name: merchant_id
columns.description: The identifier for the merchant involved in the transaction.

columns.name: trans_details
columns.description: Additional details about the transaction.

columns.name: terminal_id
columns.description: The identifier for the terminal where the transaction was processed.

columns.name: source_channel
columns.description: The channel through which the transaction was initiated.

columns.name: trans_condition
columns.description: The conditions under which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: onus
columns.description: Indicates whether the transaction is on-us or off-us.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction record was created.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: The date used for partitioning the data in the database.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source system from which the transaction data was obtained.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was processed.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The identifier for the customer's account.

columns.name: mcc
columns.description: The code representing the category of the merchant.

columns.name: wallet_type
columns.description: The type of wallet or payment method used for the transaction.
